title: Pink Snow armor
summaries: The Pink Snow armor (on [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile) is an armor set consisting of the Pink Snow Hood, Pink Snow Coat, and Pink Snow Pants.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, wearing the full set grants a total of 9 <linked>defense</linked> as well as immunity to the <linked>Chilled</linked> and <linked>Frozen</linked> <linked>debuffs</linked>. It can be mixed freely with the <linked>Snow armor</linked> and will still grant this set bonus.

On [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console and 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version], the set is called Pink Eskimo armor, consisting of the Pink Eskimo Hood, Pink Eskimo Coat, and Pink Eskimo Pants. Wearing the full set grants a total of 4 defense and no set bonus. Due to its low defense and high rarity, its viability as an armor set is rather low.

statistics.Defense: 9 (set) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 4 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 2 GC40 SC (set)
